concept.title: s.abort flag
concept.shortdesc: The abort flag can be set inside doPlugins to cause the current track call to not be sent.

conbody.p: The abort flag is reset with every tracking call, so if a subsequent tracking call also needs to be aborted the flag will need to be set again inside doPlugins.
This lets you centralize the logic you use to identify activity that you do not want to track, such as some custom links or external links in display ads.
